ValidationRule.description: validation rule on BG Approval field that does not allow users to Approve and Deny for the same product.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND(INCLUDES(BG_Approval__c,"Approved by Microwave"), INCLUDES(BG_Approval__c,"Denied by Microwave")), AND(INCLUDES(BG_Approval__c,"Approved by Nuage"), INCLUDES(BG_Approval__c,"Denied by Nuage")), AND(INCLUDES(BG_Approval__c,"Approved by Nuage"), INCLUDES(BG_Approval__c,"Denied by Nuage")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Both Approved and Denied cannot be selected for the same technology. Please select Approved or Denied.
